import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' const LoginPage = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [redirect, setRedirect] = useState(false) const login = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setUsername('') setPassword('') setRedirect(true) } if (redirect) { return ( ) } return (
login(e)}>

setUsername(e.target.value)}>

) } export default LoginPage
